source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Molding and Casting for Sculptors : Level 2
items.headline: Advanced Molding and Casting
objectives_summary: To learn how to cut up a complex sculpture and prepare it for molding.
To construct a two part mold.
To build complex vents on one part molds.

items.title: Eight Easy Steps to Writing Short Stories
items.headline: Learn a fun, original method to get yourself writing with confidence!
objectives_summary: Writing short stories

items.title: How to Make Soy Wax Candles
items.headline: Candle making for beginners
objectives_summary: Info about soy wax, its features and properties
Learn to recognize the different types of soy waxes and how to choose the most suitable one
Learn more about wicks. How they differ from one another, and their role in the candle burning process

items.title: Watercolor Landscape Workshop

visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner

items.headline: Basics and beyond
objectives_summary: Learn to paint a variety of skies
Learn to paint a variety of trees
Learn to paint a variety of grass types

items.title: Quilting: Joy of Jelly Rolls
items.headline: This extensive course covers tips and tricks for working with jelly rolls to help you make stunning quilts.
objectives_summary: This quilting course will provide instruction and tips on working with jelly rolls.
Tips on avoiding time consuming and frustrating mistakes.
Learn tips on strip piecing which is an efficient piecing method and perfect for joining strips together.

items.title: Easy watercolor painting: Magnolia flower
items.headline: Step by Step guide to complete this painting lesson in less than 2 hours. For all levels. Easy & fun. Beginners welcome!
objectives_summary: At the end of my course, students will have created a beautiful Magnolia painting
Students will have an expanded knowledge and feel of the watercolor medium in general
Students will be able to paint a three dimensional object

items.title: Drawing Academy - Creative Drawing, Illustration & Sketching
items.headline: Learn Drawing, Sketching, Pencil Drawing, Illustration, Pen Drawing, Watercolor and much more in a single Course.
objectives_summary: You’ll learn the fundamentals of drawing & Sketching
How to draw & sketch
How to manage line weight

items.title: Knitting machine: from student to professional
items.headline: Turn you hobby into a profitable business, working on the single-needle-bed knitting machine (Silver Reed SK280).
objectives_summary: You will be able short terms to achieve results in working with the single-needle-bed knitting machine.
After studying this course, you will use this knowledge many times and return the invested funds repeatedly.

items.title: Watercolor painting for beginners, paint this TURNER sunrise

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor
visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.title: David Walker

items.headline: Learn how to paint this watercolor sunrise in Venice,for the beginner artist to improve technique FREE and easy style.
objectives_summary: Students will end this course with their own impressionistic painting and,by doing the course a few times they will gain valuable knowledge.
You will feel confident laying down washes on top of each other
you will learn to tackle the little bit of drawing by using the technique I show you tracedown,used by most professional artists

items.title: Serger Techniques from Beginner to Advanced

visible_instructors.job_title: National Educator, Designer, Baby lock Educator
visible_instructors.name: Lori
visible_instructors.title: Lori Hernandez

items.headline: Serging Made Easy Thru Education, Step by Step
objectives_summary: Machine Overview
Threading
Multiple Serger Stitches - ex. Overlock Stitches, Cover and Chain Stitches

items.title: Clay jewelry with a coating of resin

visible_instructors.job_title: Online Education For Become a Better Artist
visible_instructors.name: Art
visible_instructors.title: Art School Online

items.headline: I would like to teach you how to make clay or dough jewelry with a coating of resin.
objectives_summary: The easiest way to create and craft beautiful pendant and Clay jewelry  .
In this course we will teach you to step by step tutorials with full details .
Learn how to use Clay jewelry tools

items.title: How To Draw Dogs Vol 3 - Labrador, German Shepherd & Spaniel
items.headline: Learn to Draw 3 stunning Dog Portraits by following Colin's step by step videos. Draw with this easy to learn art medium
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw 3 Different Breeds of Dogs
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: How to Paint Hollyhocks with Watercolour | After A R Quinton
items.headline: Learn how to paint using Watercolor techniques for amazing detail and impressionism with Colin Bradley.
objectives_summary: Have a completed a Painting of AR Quinton's Hollyhocks picture
Apply new watercolor techniques to their own work
Understand building colours and layers with watercolor

items.title: How To Paint a Realistic Bird in Watercolor Course  Barn Owl
items.headline: Learn to paint wildlife in watercolour!
objectives_summary: How to paint detailed feathers and the complete Barn Owl bird of prey from start to finish, using numberous watercolour techniques.
This video takes you through the whole process of painting this amazing Barn Owl in fine detailed watercolour.
Techniques such as wet in wet

items.title: Landscapes: Creating  Mood with Abstraction & Color !
items.headline: Acrylic painting with a twist!
objectives_summary: Contemporary landscapes that are abstracted and simplified.
Working with large brushes to eliminate small details. Learn to be more loose with your brushes and paints.
Learn to do a more personal colour palette by using different colour combinations and make colors that are lively and that make a statement!

items.title: Artistic Floral Creation of Comprehensive Material
items.headline: Floral design master class
objectives_summary: floral arrangement
floral design
floral design ideas
